forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and a few afternoon clouds. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few afternoon clouds. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 19C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 67F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 19C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 66F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning, then partly cloudy and windy in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 54F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later at night. Low around 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear in the evening. Increasing clouds with showers after midnight. Low 42F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
